title: Project Leona icon is not centered in the new client
body: in the old client it was

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! I can poke around today and see what's going on. I.. don't think a new asset needs to be created, but I could be wrong. We'll figure it out!  ^-^

Hi Katey^^

There's another thread http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/Utw7oLEH-aurelion-sols-portrait-in-the-after-game-screen which has a handful of champs/skins with the same issue.  I've been going through them and meaning to post something via the PBR since there are others, but since you're going to poke around I wanted to give you a heads up.
